name: encodeFor
description: Encodes a given string for safe output in the specified context. The encoding in meant to mitigate Cross Site Scripting (XSS) attacks.

params.name: type
params.description: The context of the encoding to perform.

params.name: canonicalize
params.description: When true runs the canonicalize function against the input before encoding. This argument is not supported on Lucee.

examples.title: Simple encodeFor Example
examples.description: Pass in a tag and HTML encode the result.
